00042   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00043   LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::LabeledDataSource()
00044     : bias(0.0), coeff(0.0), data(1), labels(1), dataIter(data, 0), 
00045       labelsIter(labels, 0), height(0), width(0), lblstr(NULL) {
00046   }
00047 
00048   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00049   LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::LabeledDataSource(Idx<Tdata> &data_, 
00050                                                      Idx<Tlabel> &labels_,
00051                                                      double b, double c,
00052                                                      const char *name_,
00053                                                      vector<string*> *lblstr_) 
00054     : bias(b), coeff(c), data(data_), labels(labels_), dataIter(data, 0), 
00055       labelsIter(labels, 0) {
00056     init(data_, labels_, b, c, name_, lblstr_);
00057   }
00058 
00059   template<class Tdata, class Tlabel>
00060   void LabeledDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel>::init(Idx<Tdata> &data_, 
00061                                               Idx<Tlabel> &labels_,
00062                                               double b, double c,
00063                                               const char *name_,
00064                                               vector<string*> *lblstr_) {
00065     this->data = data_;
00066     this->labels = labels_;
00067     this->height = data.dim(1);
00068     this->width = data.dim(2);
00069     this->lblstr = lblstr_;
00070     this->bias = b;
00071     this->coeff = c;
00072     this->name = (name_ ? name_ : "Unknown Dataset");
00073     typename Idx<Tdata>::dimension_iterator      dIter(this->data, 0);
00074     typename Idx<Tlabel>::dimension_iterator     lIter(this->labels, 0);
00075     this->dataIter = dIter;
00076     this->labelsIter = lIter;
00077     if (!this->lblstr) { // no names are given, use indexes as names
00078       this->lblstr = new vector<string*>;
00079       ostringstream o;
00080       int imax = idx_max(labels_);
00081       for (int i = 0; i <= imax; ++i) {
00082         o << i;
00083         this->lblstr->push_back(new string(o.str()));
00084         o.str("");
00085       }
00086     }
00087   }
00088 
00089   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00090   LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::~LabeledDataSource() {
00091     if (lblstr) { // this class owns lblstr and its content
00092       vector<string*>::iterator i = lblstr->begin();
00093       for ( ; i != lblstr->end(); ++i)
00094         if (*i)
00095           delete *i;
00096       delete lblstr;
00097     }
00098   }
00099 
00100   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00101   int LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::size() {
00102     return data.dim(0);
00103   }

00115 
00116   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00117   void LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::fprop(state_idx &out, 
00118                                               Idx<Tlabel> &label) {
00119     IdxDim d(data.spec);
00120     d.setdim(0, 1);
00121     out.resize(d);
00122     idx_fill(out.x, bias * coeff);
00123     Idx<double> tgt = out.x.select(0, 0);
00124     idx_copy(*(this->dataIter), tgt);
00125     idx_addc(out.x, bias, out.x);
00126     idx_dotc(out.x, coeff, out.x);
00127     idx_copy(*labelsIter, label);
00128   }
00129 
00130   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00131   void LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::next() {
00132     ++dataIter;
00133     ++labelsIter;
00134 
00135     if(!dataIter.notdone()) {
00136       dataIter = data.dim_begin(0);
00137       labelsIter = labels.dim_begin(0);
00138     }
00139   }
00140 
00141   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00142   void LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::seek_begin() {
00143     dataIter = data.dim_begin(0);
00144     labelsIter = labels.dim_begin(0);
00145   }
00146 
00147   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00148   void LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::display(unsigned int nh, 
00149                                                 unsigned int nw,
00150                                                 unsigned int h0,
00151                                                 unsigned int w0,
00152                                                 double zoom,
00153                                                 int wid,
00154                                                 const char *wname) {
00155 #ifdef __GUI__
00156     display_wid = (wid >= 0) ? wid : 
00157       gui.new_window((wname ? wname : name), 
00158                      nh * (height + 1) - 1, nw * (width + 1) - 1);
00159     gui.select_window(display_wid);
00160     draw(nh, nw, h0, w0, zoom);
00161 #endif
00162   }
00163 
00164   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00165   void LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::draw(unsigned int nh, unsigned int nw,
00166                                              unsigned int h0, unsigned int w0,
00167                                              double zoom) {
00168 #ifdef __GUI__
00169     gui << gui_only();
00170     IdxDim d(data.spec);
00171     state_idx s(d);
00172     Idx<double> m = s.x.select(0, 0);
00173     Idx<Tlabel> lbl;
00174     seek_begin();
00175     unsigned int h = h0, w = w0;
00176     for (unsigned int ih = 0; ih < nh; ++ih) {
00177       for (unsigned int iw = 0; iw < nw; ++iw) {
00178         fprop(s, lbl);
00179         next();
00180         m = s.x.select(0, 0);
00181         gui.draw_matrix(m, h, w, 0.0, 0.0, zoom, zoom);
00182         if ((lblstr) && (lblstr->at((int)lbl.get())))
00183           gui << at(h + 1, w + 1) << (lblstr->at((int)lbl.get()))->c_str();
00184         w += m.dim(1) + 1;
00185       }
00186       w = w0;
00187       h += m.dim(0) + 1;
00188     }
00189     seek_begin();
00190 #endif
00191   }

00195   template<class Tdata, class Tlabel>
00196   MnistDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel>::MnistDataSource(Idx<Tdata> &inp, 
00197                                                   Idx<Tlabel> &lbl,
00198                                                   intg w, intg h, 
00199                                                   double b, double c,
00200                                                   const char *name_)
00201     : LabeledDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel>(inp, lbl, b, c, name_, NULL) {
00202     this->width = w;
00203     this->height = h;
00204   }
00205 
00206   template<class Tdata, class Tlabel>
00207   void MnistDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel>::init(Idx<Tdata> &inp, Idx<Tlabel> &lbl, 
00208                                             intg w, intg h, double b, double c,
00209                                             const char *name_) {
00210     LabeledDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel>::init(inp, lbl, b, c, name_, NULL);
00211     bias = b;
00212     coeff = c;
00213     this->width = w;
00214     this->height = h;
00215   }
00216 
00217   template<class Tdata, class Tlabel>
00218   void MnistDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel>::fprop(state_idx &out, 
00219                                              Idx<Tlabel> &label) {
00220     out.resize(1, this->height, this->width);
00221     intg ni = this->data.dim(1);
00222     intg nj = this->data.dim(2);
00223     intg di = 0.5 * (this->height - ni);
00224     intg dj = 0.5 * (this->width - nj);
00225     idx_fill(out.x, bias * coeff);
00226     Idx<double> tgt = out.x.select(0, 0);
00227     tgt = tgt.narrow(0, ni, di);
00228     tgt = tgt.narrow(1, nj, dj);
00229     idx_copy(*(this->dataIter), tgt);
00230     idx_addc(out.x, bias, out.x);
00231     idx_dotc(out.x, coeff, out.x);
00232     label.set((this->labelsIter).get());
00233   }
00234 
00235   template<class Tdata, class Tlabel>
00236   bool load_mnist_dataset(const char *dir, 
00237                           MnistDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel> &train_ds, 
00238                           MnistDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel> &test_ds,
00239                           int train_size, int test_size) {
00240     // loading train and test datasets
00241     string train_datafile = dir;
00242     string train_labelfile = dir;
00243     string test_datafile = dir;
00244     string test_labelfile = dir;
00245     train_datafile += "/train-images-idx3-ubyte";
00246     train_labelfile += "/train-labels-idx1-ubyte";
00247     test_datafile += "/t10k-images-idx3-ubyte";
00248     test_labelfile += "/t10k-labels-idx1-ubyte";
00249     Idx<Tdata> train_data(1, 1, 1), test_data(1, 1, 1);
00250     Idx<Tlabel> train_labels(1), test_labels(1);
00251     if (!load_matrix<Tdata>(train_data, train_datafile.c_str())) {
00252       std::cerr << "Mnist dataset, failed to load " << train_datafile << endl;
00253       ylerror("Failed to load dataset file");
00254     }
00255     if (!load_matrix<Tlabel>(train_labels, train_labelfile.c_str())) {
00256       std::cerr << "Mnist dataset, failed to load " << train_labelfile << endl;
00257       ylerror("Failed to load dataset file");
00258     }
00259     if (!load_matrix<Tdata>(test_data, test_datafile.c_str())) {
00260       std::cerr << "Mnist dataset, failed to load " << test_datafile << endl;
00261       ylerror("Failed to load dataset file");
00262     }
00263     if (!load_matrix<Tlabel>(test_labels, test_labelfile.c_str())) {
00264       std::cerr << "Mnist dataset, failed to load " << test_labelfile << endl;
00265       ylerror("Failed to load dataset file");
00266     }
00267     
00268     // TODO: implement DataSourceNarrow instead of manually narrowing here.
00269     train_data = train_data.narrow(0, train_size, 0); 
00270     train_labels = train_labels.narrow(0, train_size, 0);
00271     test_data = test_data.narrow(0, test_size, 5000 - (0.5 * test_size)); 
00272     test_labels = test_labels.narrow(0, test_size, 5000 - (0.5 * test_size));
00273 
00274     test_ds.init(test_data, test_labels, 32, 32, 0.0, 0.01, 
00275                  "MNIST TESTING set");
00276     train_ds.init(train_data, train_labels, 32, 32, 0.0, 0.01,
00277                   "MNIST TRAINING set");
00278     return true;
00279   }

00281   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00282   void MnistDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::display(unsigned int nh, unsigned int nw,
00283                                               unsigned int h0, unsigned int w0,
00284                                               double zoom, int wid,
00285                                               const char *wname) {
00286     LabeledDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel>::display(nh, nw, h0, w0, zoom, wid, wname);
00287   }

00306   return size;
00307   }
